description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope; rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: DWG01 Existing & Proposed Elevations, DWG02 Existing & Proposed Elevations, DWG03 Existing Floor Plans, DWG04 Proposed Floor Plans, DWG05 Proposed Section, DWG06A Proposed Second Floor Plan, DWG07 Building Regulations, DWG08 Party Wall, DWG09 Typical Detail - Dormer Connection, DWG10 Block & Site Plan.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 & 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and shall contain obscure glass and be fixed shut and retained as such for the lifetime of the development

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | The window/s inserted in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD. | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
